name: Yandere Emulator
description:
While cleaning out your house you find an old computer, along with a floppy disk simply labeled "MEMORIES". 

Touching the disk gives you chills, yet you decide to boot up the PC and insert the disk as if you were possessed...

You wake up in a dark room, your vision impaired by a strange device on your head. A TV screen turns on, a strange sound comes from it: "Senpai~"

Programmer: 730

Scripter: Kidajiwo

Art Team: Kooh, Ulyseto, Player_Unknown08 (MHG)

Music: Denki

SFX: Denki

Writer/Director: PeronJames

Special Thanks: Frozec, Spitko, Sophicsheep, Stocking

Made with Godot 3.2

Known bugs:

-Ending (both bad and good) music doesn't stop after the game ends and restarts. Close the game and open it again if that is the case.
